snippet.title: Battlesmiths: Blade and Forge — Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Welcome to Battlesmiths, a role-playing strategy game with a deep crafting system and tactical combat. Free your town, craft powerful weapons and armor, equip your heroes and battle dangerous enemies and other players!

Play now:
Google Play: https://bit.ly/44Xt6o3
App Store: https://apple.co/3PM6keN
PC version will be available at https://battlesmiths.com/?utm_source=trailer
